title: Dinner at school
creator_credit: Seven League Productions and H.M. Nieter
brief_description: Stresses the desirability, during World War II, of a hot midday meal for school children, and shows what was done in Great Britain to make such a meal available, free of charge or at a very low cost.
description: Stresses the desirability, during World War II, of a hot midday meal for school children, and shows what was done in Great Britain to make such a meal available, free of charge or at a very low cost.
